price: Ɛberε a (Soro abͻfoͻ) mmienu no a wͻ’gye nsεm (a onipa ka no) regye nsεm no, (ͻbaako) te nifa so εna (ͻbaako nso) te benkum soͻ,
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
